 9 -class CategoryAdmin(admin.ModelAdmin): 

10      """Admin for Category model"""

12      fields = ('title', 'parent', 'description', 'slug')

22 -    def get_tree_path(self, category): 

23          """Return the category's tree path in HTML""" 
24          try: 
25              return '<a href="%s" target="blank">/%s/</a>' % \ 
26                     (category.get_absolute_url(), category.tree_path) 
27          except NoReverseMatch: 
28              return '/%s/' % category.tree_path 

29      get_tree_path.allow_tags = True 
30      get_tree_path.short_description = _('tree path')
